name: Insurgency Tactics
description: Methods used by insurgent forces to destabilize superior military opponents.

cards.title: Hit-and-Run Attacks
cards.description: Executing rapid ambushes and withdrawing before retaliation.
cards.bulletpoints: Use speed, small unit coordination, and mobile concealment

cards.title: Sabotage and Supply Chain Disruption
cards.description: Targeting logistical vulnerabilities to weaken enemy forces.
cards.bulletpoints: Disrupt supply lines, destroy key infrastructure, and utilize deception
